name: ibrahim-shittu-portfolio
description: Portfolio and blog for Ibrahim Shittu, Senior Software Engineer

scripts.seo-check: next build && echo 'SEO files generated:' && ls -la .next/server/app && echo 'Sitemap:' && curl -s http://localhost:3000/sitemap.xml | head -20
scripts.test-seo: npm run build && npm run start & sleep 5 && curl -s http://localhost:3000/sitemap.xml > /dev/null && curl -s http://localhost:3000/robots.txt > /dev/null && echo 'SEO endpoints working!' && pkill -f 'next start'
